name: Soul Astray
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I just wish I could see another perspective
One wish is all I ask for to help me with this perplexion
Please, just say a word, I need to hear a voice
Please, just say a word, I'd hate to ask you twice
(Just tell me)
[Instrumental Break]
[Verse 2]
I just wish they could see another perspective
One wish is all I ask for to get a second chance
They can't see the truth
I need to hear a voice
They won't know the truth
(They won't know the truth)
(Just tell me)
[Instrumental Break]
[Outro]
I just wish I could see another perspective
One wish is all I ask for to help me with this perplexion
Please, just say a word, I need to hear a voice
Please, just say a word, I'd hate to ask you twice
